welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wandlitz, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our lakeside town and immerse yourself in our rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Wandlitz has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-tegel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-tegel Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
